tool_description: Tracks pricing changes over time for specified products to identify pricing events and patterns.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to track pricing history

start_date.description: Start date for price history tracking

end_date.description: End date for price history tracking

include_promotions.description: Whether to include promotional pricing events

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
Product not found: One or more product IDs do not exist in the pricing database.
No pricing data available: No pricing records found for the specified products in the given date range.
usage: Provide array of product_ids and date range to track price changes. Set include_promotions to false to exclude temporary promotional pricing.

price_changes_count.description: Total number of price changes detected

products_with_changes.description: List of product IDs that had price changes

tracking_summary.description: Summary of pricing trends and patterns
